content: How frequently are updates set to occur in account settings?
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
Really I thought cox sent instructions for that. My understanding is there is something you need to do with Cox to accept the transference. But as a non Cox customer living about as far from Atlanta as it is possible to be and still be on the same planet, it is only an understanding.

Is you current cox account IMAP or POP? It is the first thing on the pane in account settings > server settings.
creator: MattAuSupport
